1.name: Exploding Pig
1.desc: You have to defuse this card with Defusion Pig, if you don't have one you blow up

2.name: Defusion Pig
2.desc: It's only use is to defuse Exploding Pig, protect it at all costs!

3.name: Skip
3.desc: Skip this turn without picking a card

4.name: Skip everything
4.desc: Skip this round without picking a card, even if you have many turns on you

5.name: Reverse
5.desc: Reverse the game order and and one turn without picking a card

6.name: Attack
6.desc: Skip this turn without picking a card. Next player in the order has 2 turns

7.name: Sniper
7.desc: Skip this round without picking a card and choose a player (can be yourself) that will play 2 turns

9_3.name: View the future (3 cards)
9_3.desc: Take the three outerwear cards, look at them and put it back on the deck

9_4.name: View the future (4 cards)
9_4.desc: Take the four outerwear cards, look at them and put it back on the deck

9_5.name: View the future (5 cards)
9_5.desc: Take the five outerwear cards, look at them and put it back on the deck

10_3.name: Change the future (3 cards)
10_3.desc: Take the three outerwear cards, look at them (you can change the order of them) and put it back on the deck

10_4.name: Change the future (4 cards)
10_4.desc: Take the four outerwear cards, look at them (you can change the order of them) and put it back on the deck

10_5.name: Change the future (5 cards)
10_5.desc: Take the five outerwear cards, look at them (you can change the order of them) and put it back on the deck

11.name: Fundraiser
11.desc: Every player has to pick one card to add to the deck. After that the deck is shuffled

12.name: Profanation
12.desc: Profanate on of the player's cards - it will be visible for other players until it is stolen or used

13.name: Nu Nu Nu
13.desc: Stop the player's action, or negate other player's Nu Nu Nu. Can be used after several actions

14_1.name: Cake
14_1.desc: Use two of those cards to steal a card from the selected player

14_2.name: Ice cream
14_2.desc: Use two of those cards to steal a card from the selected player

14_3.name: Cupcake
14_3.desc: Use two of those cards to steal a card from the selected player

14_4.name: Rum bomb
14_4.desc: Use two of those cards to steal a card from the selected player

14_5.name: Cake slice
14_5.desc: Use two of those cards to steal a card from the selected player

15.name: Candy pumpkin
15.desc: Use as any of the sweet cards

16.name: Favor
16.desc: The player chosen by you has to give you chosen by him card (if he has any)

17.name: Piggasaki
17.desc: All the Exploding Pigs are on the top of the deck, the bottom part of deck is shuffled

18.name: Hiropiga
18.desc: All the Exploding Pigs are on the bottom of the deck, the top part of deck is shuffled

19.name: Take from the bottom
19.desc: Take the card in your turn from the bottom instead of top
